lines.text:
[Overhearing on the radio he's been blamed for Denny's death and his career in law is now over]
Oh great, all I'm gonna be able to do is teach.
Denny was good kid.
He was spoiled.
Fuck me... You lucky kid!
[last lines]
They sure fucked with the wrong guy.

[makes a U-turn after seeing the police roadblock ahead]
They didn't see me. They didn't see me.
[sees one of the police cars starting to follow him]
Yeah, they saw me.

[In the TV Version, Mr. Halloran was playing a pool table. And he hit a good shot. The elevator opened and there was Sammy and Marv found and bringing Charlie here to meet Halloran. Mr. Halloran can't wait]
Do you know who I am?
Halloran.
[Grab his hair by Marv. Charlie gasp]
Mr. Halloran.
[Mr. Halloran nods his head to have Sammy and Marv letting Charlie go. Charlie has to tell the truth]
Mr. Halloran, listen to me. I didn't kill your son. He fell. He hit his head. It was an accident.
Is that right?
Yes.
An accident?
Yes.
How about that?
[Mr. Halloran sighs]
It always it's just been a misunderstanding, right?
That's right.
[Sammy overhears Charlie. So does Marv]
Come on. I - I can't believe there's not something we can work out here.
[Mr. Halloran smiles and comforts this kid Charlie Farrow on the shoulder. And Charlie was impressed. But suddenly, Mr. Halloran kicks Charlie. Mr. Halloran is a bad man and he is hurting Charlie]
What are you take me for? You little creep!
I don't know you using what I'm saying.
Because I don't talk to dead man.
[Mr. Halloran kicks Charlie]
Toss this garbage.

[In the TV Version with no profanity]
What are you doing?
Get out! Now!
No! No! Take me to the cops!
Forget the cops, man! Don't mess with them! Don't mess with nobody! You hear me?
What?
[But the car is coming to chase Charlie]
Get down! Get down!
No. What is this about?
You're in deep trouble, my friend! Forget that! I'm in big trouble! Get out of here!
No!
Get out of here!
Why am I in big trouble?
Why?
Yes!
You kill Matt Halloran! So no ones gonna kill you!
Then who's Matt Halloran?
Matt Halloran own that place back there! He owns his whole town, man! Get out of here!
No! Wait! Wait!
He's a kid. And you lost him?
No, we didn't. We didn't. The cops had him at that point. Their the wasn't lost them. We still have the money.
I don't want the money. I don't want any excuses. I want that kid. Get out there and find him!
[Sammy and Marv are heading to the elevator and then leaves to find that kid named Charlie Farrow]
Halsey's dead.
What?
O'Rourke and Smithy were tracking the kid. Halsey's got to the scene. And the kid... pull the gun.
Oh, no. No. Where did that kid get a gun?
Who cares? Halsey's dead. And if you been on the street, instead of diddle around with this junk! He's still might be alive! Get back out there. And take this kid down.

[In the best modified version in the last line. Martins have framed Charlie]
They sure fool with the wrong guy.
[Martins comfort Charlie in the shoulder and clear Charlie's name]
